tool_description: 🚀 Fast and stable Instagram API. Scrape any information from IG: user infos, media, stories, comments and more. Don't miss! Custom plans and crypto payments are available on request – feel free to contact us https://t.me/rocketapi or contact@rocketapi.io. We will be happy to help you integrate the API into your system.
name: RocketAPI for Instagram
title: RocketAPI for Instagram

api_list.name: Get Highlight Stories
api_list.description:
Retrieve highlight(s) stories by highlight id(s).

You can retrieve up to 4 highlight ids per request.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://rocketapi-for-instagram.p.rapidapi.com/instagram/highlight/get_stories"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rocketapi-for-instagram.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://rocketapi-for-instagram.p.rapidapi.com/instagram/highlight/get_stories"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rocketapi-for-instagram.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Location Media
api_list.description:
Retrieve location media by location id.

In order to use pagination, you need to use both the `max_id` and `page` parameters. You can obtain these values from the response's `next_page` and `next_max_id` fields.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://rocketapi-for-instagram.p.rapidapi.com/instagram/location/get_media"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rocketapi-for-instagram.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rocketapi-for-instagram.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get User Clips
api_list.description:

        }

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rocketapi-for-instagram.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
